actions.text: Amendment SA 2257 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 2257 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Brown to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4194) To require a report on the use and potential refurbishment of existing operating and mothballed Federal research and testing facilities to support hypersonics activities of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2257 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
